website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-give chews are a big plus for this probiotic, which also does a good job of improving dogs’ digestive health.
pros: Most dogs like the chews, which can be given as treats
Owners report positive results from supplement, improving dogs’ digestive issues
cons: A few reports of dogs experiencing sensitivity, lots of gas, and other adverse symptoms
Some dogs don’t like the taste

customer_reviews.title: Be careful what you are feeding your pet- these are NOT US made
customer_reviews.text: This product is probably made in China. Every time I try to get an answer out of this company of where this product is manufactured- they lie and give me a state- no address- just a state. I research with the FDA ,(as it says on the bottle they are FDA inspected) there is no such mfg in that state that the FDA inspects. Also- they they they are vet formulated. Which Vet? They won't answer that question either. Also- the Portland OR address on the bottle is a distribution center.
customer_reviews.author: Karen LK

customer_reviews.title: Buddy has crossed the "Rainbow Bridge GOD BLESS BUDDY
customer_reviews.text: Sadly my "buddy" had to be "put down" on 03Apr17. He was a 11 yr old border collie and was THE BEST DOG IN THE WORLD. I had used your product for about 3 yrs and I believe he enjoyed and helped him with "bouts" of diarrhea. That plagued him about once every 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: S-19

customer_reviews.title: Has saved our dog from full day of itching and licking.
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a god send for our dog. She was diagnosed with a yeast infection and was given antibiotics and other medicines to help with uncontrollable itching and discomfort. The medicines were making her very lazy and had taken the life out of our precious baby girl. I ordered this product and within a day, there was a dramatic decrease in her itching and licking. It's been a few days now and she has completely stopped all the itching and licking that were driving her crazy. Incredibly happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: RickyOneill

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than 2 other probiotics that we had tried
customer_reviews.text: my dog went from mushy stools to normal stools almost overnight. Worked better than 2 other probiotics that we had tried.
customer_reviews.author: F. Gamel

customer_reviews.title: so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: while my dog was hesitant to try them, he did finally and his skin is clearing up. i got these to help his sensitive stomach and to aid in his digestion and allergy issues. so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: angkizzez

customer_reviews.title: Very big difference
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 week old puppy that was very gassy and I was starting to transition his food so his poop was really soft. Also he had kennel cough and an upper respiratory infection. I have to say with this probiotic I have seen a pretty big difference. His poop is normal, no more gas, and he has a lot more energy throughout the day. I'm pretty impressed with this product
customer_reviews.author: Meggan

customer_reviews.title: Helped My Girl Sleep to Spite Her Allergies
customer_reviews.text: Are her allergies gone? No. BUT the first day I gave her the priotic in the morning and then again before bed, and she slept through the night. Our sweet girl had itched through the night for MONTHS while taking an EXPENSIVE probiotic for humans (one that I take). One day on this probiotic specifically for dogs, and my girl slept through the night and continues to sleep through the night weeks later. I am a customer for the rest of my sweet pup's life. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LunaLovegood

customer_reviews.title: Contains palm oil
customer_reviews.text: Contains palm oil which is contributing to deforestation & loss of habitat for many species of animals such as orangutans. Will look for different brand now that I’m aware this is an ingredient since I do not purchase items with palm oil. Also, Saw no improvement in my dogs heakthvover course of a month.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...Not anymore!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this on subscription, so I get this probiotic about once every month. I love it. However, the last 2 bottles have come already clumped together. Its extremely frustrating. If my next order is like this, I'm going to have to switch brands. 5/12/17 update (upgrade from 2 to 5) Since my original post, I was contacted directly by the owner who apologized for the partially clumped batches I received. I just received my new order today and I'm extremely happy to report no clumps!!! This product works for my greyhound and I will continue to PetVitalityPRO.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Black

customer_reviews.title: I got a moldy green one...!?
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine yesterday and I was very disappointed to open a rotten jar. It was moldy and green, smelled putrid, and I would like a refund or a new jar, please. This is NOT okay to send rotten products to paying customers.
customer_reviews.author: Chicagodog

customer_reviews.title: My dog thinks I'm giving him a treat!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to take our dog's already holistic healthy lifestyle to the next level after a cancer scare. Finding a good probiotic was one of the first things I looked for. I did my research and this product met my criteria. I've seen an improvement in his energy level and know I'm doing something positive for his gut health and immune system. I give him two a day as recommended for his weight...one in the morning on an empty stomach and one at night before bed. He comes running for them. I like they don't have to be refrigerated and that they're shaped like little hearts. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work so bad! My 80 pound, 7 year old Lab has intermittent tummy issues as well as bad breath and yeasty skin issues. After reading the reviews I thought this product would be the answer. Nope, even with starting her out with the lowest dose, she vomited the first day, and then had bad diarrhea continuing for an entire week. I stopped giving these chews to her, diarrhea cleared up, and has normal firm stool again. According to allot of these reviews, I guess it has helped some with their fur babies, but not mine. Bummer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Yeast infection on skin came back!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 senior dogs got yeast infections on their skins after taking this. So I have checked all ingredients, and found yeast! If your dog ever suffered with yeast infection previously in the past, do not give them this. It will come back.
customer_reviews.author: JRNT

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Likes and Needs These Chewables
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes these chewable probiotics. He's been taking them now for 8 days and seems to be in good intestinal health. Update: My dog has been on these for 2 months now. He has his appetite back and doesn't throw up as much. He really likes his special "treat"! Update 9/17: I stopped giving these to my dog for a couple of months. He started throwing up again. So I will be ordering these as long as I have him!
customer_reviews.author: Joyfulspirit

customer_reviews.title: Placebo effect...
customer_reviews.text: This had RAVE reviews, and we were desperate! Our seven year old German Shepherd suffers from horrible allergies, a bad gut, OCD, and a myriad of issues. I was simply hoping for help with her gut, and as a result maybe her allergies. We didn't see any improvement at all from this. She is still desperately in need of her insanely expensive apoquel, and an antibiotic plus medicated shampoo to manage her symptoms. It's misery, but we love her! I don't think this is a bad product, but, I am not sure anymore about reviews on Amazon. Half the time they are from free products, or who knows what! As paying customers... this didn't do anything!
customer_reviews.author: K Rene Ross

customer_reviews.title: My dog is allergick to pollen this product has alafa ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergick to pollen this product has alafa witch can give him a serve allergic reaction the ingredients listed did not mention alfala on web page but dose list it on product lable unfortunately I can not give them to my dog but am giving them to my son for his dog
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Product
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say a BIG thank you for saving my dog life. My puppy had vomiting and diarrhea for 2 days, no energy, no eating, she was almost dying, I decided to take her to a vet plus I was searching on amazon about these symptoms then saw your product with good reviews, I ordered it and got the probiotics in the same day, right away I gave 2 chowing tablest to her and saw the transformation in the morning, she was all happy and running everywhere with full of energy. This is a miracle product. Thank you thank you alot. You guys are the best. :)
customer_reviews.author: Anet A

customer_reviews.title: Wow. My 11yo golden retriever has been developing chronic ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow. My 11yo golden retriever has been developing chronic digestive problems with loose and runny stools. Only five days in with this probiotic and I see marked improvement. Almost back to normal after months of issues. My reorder is on the way!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a puppy. Golden doodle and I had noticed him itching every now and then and thought I'd try this based on the reviews of the product. He was also sometimes vomiting at night. He's been on it at least 8 days. Zero vomiting. Zero scratching his coat! I believe it's this formula that has eased the issues to no issues at all. He loves it too! He's 4 1/2 mo this old and 50 pounds and I give him two daily.
customer_reviews.author: Donna McLain

customer_reviews.title: Look at their website. Something isn’t right. No address or phone number.
customer_reviews.text: These made my dog throw up and now days later he seems unable to eat enough food. He’s starving. He had no issues before and wasn’t sick. I bought them to supplement only. I visited the website today and honestly the poor grammar and sentence structure has me wondering if this is some scam company from India or China. There is no address or telephone number anywhere on the website. Very shady. I threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Madwoman

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Chewable Helped Itchy Hotspots
customer_reviews.text: This product has been very helpful for my elderly Boston Terrier! She had a liver issue a few months back. Thankfully she recovered from that. It left her with dry itchy skin and a few bald patches. Frequent baths and vitamins weren't enough to control the itch for her. I saw these and decided too try them. She thinks they are a tasty treat. Her itching has subsided. Glad there is something other than steroids that work for her. Update: Hair has re grown fully. Energy level equal to or surpasses four or five years ago. Just placed a third order.
customer_reviews.author: Veteran Teacher

customer_reviews.title: My dog used to itch so much and all the time, not any more!!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs was itching non stop. Benadryl didnt work. Oatmeal bath didnt work. Then I did research, a dogs digestive system does so much for it. This stopped all the itching after 3 days. I used hot spot spray for 3 days and that helped, but this stuff works so well that I don't need the spray anymore. Dog eats it like it's a treat which is awesome. My dog is so much more happy. I am so much more happy that I don't have to watch my dog itch like crazy. Cocker spaniel, female, 2 years old, black. Not sure if that matters but there you go.
customer_reviews.author: Berneymc

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous supplement
customer_reviews.text: My dog has never been majorly sick. I gave her a 1/2 dose one day and the next. Twelve hours later she seemed like she was dying. I took her to the vet and they say maybe pancreatitis. Three days later she is finally starting to be a normal dog. I can't prove this stuff did this, but it sure seems unusual. $460.00 bill from the vet also. This also contains palm oil which contributes to tropical deforestation
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: really makes him smell good, I don't really like the spray to much ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these, he asks for them every morning, at first I didn't think they would work but after a week I started seeing he wasn't itching and his skin was healing, it took about 2 weeks for his fur to start growing back, I will be ordering more of these, I also use they're shampoo and conditioner. really makes him smell good, I don't really like the spray to much and neither does he. but they're other products I would tell any body about.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mccollum

customer_reviews.title: I am really happy I began giving this product
customer_reviews.text: I have a shep mix that we rescued. She has some allergy issues and has been a paw licker and recently started scooting her back end across carpets etc to "itch". Benedryl has not ever seemed to help. I found this product and have been giving it to our dog about two weeks now. She isn't "itching" feet or back end now. I am really happy I began giving this product. I put them on top of her evening kibble just so it's part of the routine, but our dog will eat them seperately- so she's just as happy to eat it as a treat too.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: My dog is dead after taking this once
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my shihtzu For the first time yesterday around noon. He died this morning, suddenly, without any signs of sickness or anything to explain why. Just didn’t wake up.
customer_reviews.author: AUTUMN

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product. My 13+ year old Labrador Retriever has had issues with terrible gas and semi-soft stools for about two years. I had been using another product (more expensive and while it did help with the gas, the stools were still not great) but am much happier with Pet Vitality Pro. Firmer stools and no stinky gas. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have waited to write a review because I wanted to be confident in the results of using this product. I am so thankful for this supplement! My dog has had digestive issues for a few months that would improve and then return. He was routinely suffering from nausea and vomiting. I read the reviews on these probiotics and decided to give them a try. Within 7-10 days our dog’s health improved dramatically and he had more energy and was playing again! His symptoms have not returned and I plan to keep these probiotics as a part of his daily “treats”. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Missey Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I looked into many other probiotic products and decided to give this one a try. My puppy has a sensitive stomach, she would constantly get constipated and I needed something for home use. I could not afford to keep taking her to the vet. She weights a little over 25 pounds, normally I give her one a day. If she eats something out of the ordinary I'll give her two just to be safe. Great product! I recommend it and will continue using it. I would first buy the smaller package to see if it works for you, but if you plan on using this product the larger pack is such a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy G

customer_reviews.title: dogs like them
customer_reviews.text: just acquired a new rescue lab, and his breath was horrible and could tell he was not given good healthy food. Burping all the time and smelled of bacon (we don't eat bacon). Thought I would give these a try to help him with digestion and health (also he was in an enclosed area no grass and sleeping on concrete--poor guy). I liked the ingredients listed on this product. He is doing so much better now, lost some weight and is acting like a puppy ( he is 7 years old) running jumping chasing etc. I will continue to use this product, yes it is a bit expensive but the larger container is a better buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: So upset with myself!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it took me a year and a half to figure out what was the cause of both of our dogs continually getting skin sores. So upset with myself! I went around in circles changing the foods we give them, along with their omega 3 oils and their shampoos, etc. You name it. Not to mention the expense involved. Then it dawned on me... THESE innocent-looking little things! I’m relieved and thrilled to say — no more sores since stopping these things.
customer_reviews.author: marky

customer_reviews.title: the owners of this company are fantastic and really care about animals
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. My daughter and I both bought it for our dogs. We both saw an improvement in their well being. More vitality! FYI, the owners of this company are fantastic and really care about animals!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Roesti

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for skin problems
customer_reviews.text: This was my third order. I have been very pleased with the results I see with my dog's skin allergies. Before starting him on these little gems his skin was always red and irritated from his constant licking. They seemed to help right away - within a few days. Both of my dogs love them. They think they are treats and beg for them. There is a slight earthy smell to them but it's not obnoxious in any way, and I'm super-sensitive to odors. No worries there. Happy dogs!
customer_reviews.author: research_first

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for our dog.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for relief for my 14 year old dog from itching; however, this made him MUCH worse. I went back and read some of the low reviews and I do notice this sometimes has the opposite effect. I would appreciate a refund and I am sorry this did not work for my dog - I was really hoping this would work. :(
customer_reviews.author: ivyvine1

customer_reviews.title: Helps with itchy feet and skin
customer_reviews.text: My second purchase of this product, as it helps my dog Jack with his itching. It doesn't get rid of it completely but it sure helps. I have changed his food, I give him a product that relieves dry skin, but he still bites on his feet and licks himself sometimes. I think some of it has to do with where we live and the pollen/allergens in the air, and he just is more susceptible to that sort of thing. But this probiotic product definitely helps and I'm happy for that. So is Jack!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent + Helps with Flatulence (honest review, not in exchange for anything)
customer_reviews.text: This REALLY helps with my dog’s flatulence. I’ve been giving it to her for about 2 years now. She is a 3 year old mixed breed shelter mutt, 80 pounds, golden/red short hair. Looks like a Vizsla or a Weimaraner. I’ve tried other probiotics but this is the best for her. She likes the taste, eats them like treats. The smell doesn’t offend me as many others do. And as said before, really helps get rid of her stinky toots!
customer_reviews.author: Nonilex

customer_reviews.title: My dog is not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog with IBS who just finished a long round of antibiotics. I had been giving her a different probiotic that came in a packet but decided to try this. Let me say she is NOT picky. At all. But she wants nothing to do with these as treats. She turns her nose away and won't eat it. Because they aren't cheap I crumble them up and sprinkle them on her food with canned dog food so I'm not throwing money away. They aren't brown either - they are green and really soft. Maybe they will work for some of you. But for me it is just easier to go back to the packets.
customer_reviews.author: RAE65

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I am just getting through our first jat of 60 at this time. At this time I think the product is work and today I just bought the larger jar to reload. I think for it to work we have to consistent on doling this out. Today I am content with it, so far so good. UPDATE 7-12-19. My dog Buddy was having skin problems, it would bother him all night and it was affecting his sleep. Now he is sleeping so well it's truly amazing. More too come.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a rescued Irish Setter that needs to be on a probiotic daily. WIthout a probiotic, she immediately develops diarrhea. I've used this product for quite a while now with great results. Kate takes her "treat" every morning without a fuss. I didn't rate the flavor because I have no idea how it tastes and I really have not smelled the product. I just hand it to Kate first thing in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: D. McClelland

customer_reviews.title: If I could give 10 stars, I would
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old boxer/pit bull mix, would have horribly rancid gas everyday. It was awful and embarrassing when we had any visitors. Roxy weighs 71 lbs, and I only give her one probiotic each morning with her breakfast, and it works great. Her stomach doesn’t make weird noises anymore, and not one stinky toot since. So, it’s great only using one per day, and the 60 count bottle will last for 2 months. I did have to crumble it onto her food, because she wouldn’t eat it like a treat. I thought I would have to live the rest of my life with my shirt covering my nose. Thank God this works.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: My border collie suffers from chronic colitis. No known ...
customer_reviews.text: My border collie suffers from chronic colitis. No known cause. The vet prescribed Purina Forti-Fora at $40+ for one month. This PetVitality product works every bit as well at less than half the price. Lindy loves her treats at breakfast, and her diarrhea is completely gone!
customer_reviews.author: Baby Gurl's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Parvo Survivor:) Years of loose stools turned to normal poops!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had parvo when she was a pup and almost died. The Parvo destroyed her gut. Gut health in dogs and humans is so important. This caused other issues to occur after a few years like allergies and skin issues. Ever since, no matter what food I gave her, she always had loose stools. We started with this about 4-5 months ago after my vet recommended finding a good probiotic. So glad this is the first one we tried because it has worked SO well. Bella takes 2 in the am and 2 in the pm and has normal healthy poops and this has helped significantly in conjunction with allergy drops with ALL skin issues as well:)
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Within a few days
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Within a few days, great improvement in my 11 yr. old ChineseCrested that has been suffering from stomach issues that $700 worth of tests could not diagnose. Went from 6-8 loose to liquid bm's a day to normal within a couple of days. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alona Coe

customer_reviews.title: Took Some Time But Wow It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: My beautiful boston terrier Amanda had the worst breath which I understand tells me of health issues she was having. I tried everything and nothing worked. I started her on these probiotics and it took about a month and a half but now her breath smells so fresh, wow, can't believe that was her issue but it was. Also she had one ear that was always draining and itchy and now that has cleared up as well. Whew, thank you, I will forever be a customer!
customer_reviews.author: mooseabout

customer_reviews.title: I feed all of them grain free and add veggies ( sweet potatoes and green beans and occasionally apples for antioxidant ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 dogs and all are special needs in one way or another. I feed all of them grain free and add veggies ( sweet potatoes and green beans and occasionally apples for antioxidant benifits. We still have issues with skin being dry and allergies to pollen and fleas. Since taking the probiotics we have seen a decrease in allergy symptoms and improvement in the skin and coats of all the dogs. We have decided to stay on his for a good six months to really give it a chance. I recommend it for dogs of all ages a mine range from 3years to 12 years.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Give it time
customer_reviews.text: Gave my French Bulldog diarrhea. Stopped giving them to her and it cleared up. Will try again to see if that's what caused it. Will update after. UPDATE: Tried again with first two days of diarrhea then no issues after. She no longer has to be on her allergy meds. Looks like this is doing something for her. Made a second order and purchased the larger bottle. Was disappointed that they were not as soft as last batch. The company was so nice when I wrote them. She explained everything clearly and went above and beyond to please me even after I was satisfied with her explanation. Life long customer now. They stand behind their product 110%.
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Fast improvements noticed.
customer_reviews.text: Bentley had a weak stomach and would vomit if he was fed anything other than his normal food. He also had a distinct odor about him (not bad, just distinct). Within just a few days, the odor vanished, he could tolerate other foods including some occasional food scraps he was always begging for. Most noticeable was the change in his countenance. He seems happier and more energetic. He regards the morsel a treat and looks forward to it each day.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stop dog from eating poop
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this product for over 5 months now mainly hoping to stop the new dog from eating her own and our other dog's poop. It was hard to tell whether it was working since I almost always clean up the poop immediately. Last week we were out camping. Being out in the wilderness, the new dog had the opportunities to chow down on poop twice! I guess it didn't work. Now we are going to try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: These really helped my dogs overall health
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old Yorkie Bichon was shedding, losing weight, scratching and just looking run down. After several months of one of these chewables daily he is definitely back to normal. No more scratching, his coat is healthier and shedding down to almost zero and his poop is back to normal. If you are not a believer and your dog is shedding,scratching, listless, and has irregular bowel movements then his guy health may be suffering. Try these, they worked for me. Follow up...now he's looking great, high energy, no scratching, these things really work for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old miniature poodle with apparent digestive issues (excessive gas and indigestion) after putting him on a salmon and sweet potato dog food. Doing better but still has a few problems. Spent life before me on only Kibbles and Bits. He ate almost nothing when I got him in April, 2019, as a rescue.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Twietmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing change
customer_reviews.text: I was having problems with my two Golden Retrievers having thin stool on a regular basis. I changed their diet from canned food and kibble to FreshPet refrigerated food and sweet potato base kibble. I am also giving them each a Probiotic Premium Plus tablet daily. I had positive results immediately. After a month they have had zero problems. I don't know if was the food change or the probiotics but I have a feeling it was the combination of the two.I will definitely stay with this diet program.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Stopped the itchy skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third order of this Probiotic for my Havanese. Aft read the reviews & being tired of dishing out hundred of dollars to my vet for allergy related skin conditions & terrible itching! After reading some reviews on how this helped this problem & digestive issues I thought I'd give it a try! Well...not one skin issue in months! To be honest he still licks two paws a lot but I think he's a little neurotic! Try this product..it really helped my fur baby!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. C

customer_reviews.title: No Gas
customer_reviews.text: Annie, our 2 year old German Short Hair Pointer, is a wonderful dog. Smart, sweet, kind, obedient, protective...but the gas! Oi! I thought I had tried everything, but then I found these. She's 40 pounds and I give her one a day. NO gas! Don't get me wrong. She's still a dog. When she goes out and rolls around in the woods, she still stinks. When she plays in the rain, she smells like a wet dog. But...NO gas! Also, she eats them willingly. I don't have to trick her with liverwurst. She thinks they are treats. Highly recommended. 6 stars. ****1 year later. Still great.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Moldy! Made my dog sick!
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt home when this arrived and my boyfriend opened the bottle and gave our dog 1/2 a dose. A few hours later I noticed my dog was trembling and holding his head very weird. I immediately went and looked at the probiotics which were a very green color not like the picture. He is still acting strange the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica O

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second order and so far, my girls love this product. I purchased becausey younger dog eats her own "you know what" and I heard a probiotic was good to stop this behavior. She had almost stopped this completely! My older girl (almost 11) has had very loose stool for about a year. We've tried everything that the vet suggested - fasting, food changes, special diets - but nothing has helped. She's been on this for a few weeks now and having mostly normal BMs. I'm a fan of the product so far and will most likely continue to order.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Pup love these
customer_reviews.text: My puppy (13 yr old shitzu) loves these. She has a sensitive stomach that has only gotten worse with age, and so I thought I’d try some probiotics. After reading the reviews I went with these. I did not see a change right away. Her stools were very mucusy, half the time mushy (pudding) and half time normal. After about two weeks I started noticing a consistent firmness. Four weeks, no to very little mucus. After that I put these bad boys on subscription order. Lucky me, since she loves them so much, I’m able to use them as treats when we do even eye medications- and she comes running instead of running away!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Dog Does Not Like
customer_reviews.text: My dog will not eat these unless I hide them in a piece of cheese or canned dog food. She is usually not picky especially if she thinks they are a treat. Not sure how well the product works as she just started taking them. Going to switch to a product I previously used since she eats them without any problem. I'm sure there are some dogs who like these just not mine as all dogs are different.
customer_reviews.author: M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to give to my dog while she was on antibiotics for a bladder infection. The chews are pretty big so smaller dogs may need them cut in half, but they are soft and easy for the dogs to chew. My dog lost half her lower jaw to cancer and still managed to eat them. The chews do have a slight odor and my dog didn't seem crazy about them. I had to give her one and then hold out a treat she loves to encourage her to eat the probiotic first. Her output; both urine and feces, appeared normal while taking this product and that's what I was hoping for in giving it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Polk

customer_reviews.title: My dog did not tolerate this product at all. ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog did not tolerate this product at all. Now I'm stuck with about 130 of these diarrhea-inducing things. I probably should have known they would cause an issue after smelling them the first time, they are rough on the nose.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Works for Us !!
customer_reviews.text: We were using a higher priced probiotic and they raised the price again !!! - So the search began - much research as my dog was the tester - this product was the second one we tried - Our dog has been on it for about a month and is doing quite well - stool is firm but soft - regularity is very constant - Our dog is a 10 lb. Poodle with stomach issues since early in life and she is 8 yrs now. She seems to like this product - I just sprinkle it on top of her food and she eats with not hesitation. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barks Computer Solutions

customer_reviews.title: he's GREAT. No gas
customer_reviews.text: For years my Shepherd has had digestive trouble. I've spent a fortune on vets and prescription food, raw diets, other probiotics. Within 5 days, he's GREAT. No gas, no diarrhea. I can ditch all those Yankee candles and sleep all night without having to get up to let him out. He is not a food-driven dog, in fact, will go for days without eating, so powders are difficult. This I can shove in his mouth and make him swallow it even if he's not hungry. He is actually eating more now (he's pretty underweight), which I am sure is because his tummy feels better.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: Our GSD puppy came to us with extreme diarrhea. We gave him some probiotics that our dogs had previously done well on. Those helped a bit but we were running low on them. He is now on his third day of the new probiotics and his stools are firm. He is still itching but I am hopeful that these will help with the allergies he may have also! Update: His itching has almost stopped completely thanks to the new dog food, Farmina. He has an allergy to chicken and even though this has a flavoring, it doesn't seem to have an issue with it at all. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Expensive Per Dose!
customer_reviews.text: These are CHEWS, not loose powder, so very expensive per serving. Three per day are recommended for medium dogs. I have 3 Shorthaired Pointers, so the 60 tabs included will only last 20 days. Powdered probiotics are MUCH more economical. I am a big fan of dog probiotics, and have been using them for 3 years. Between the 3 dogs, the chronic cases of dandruff, ear infections and diarrhea have disappeared! Our vet recommended that we switch brands occasionally to get the widest variety of microbes. I do not recommend PetVitality Pro, and I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Edog

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My sweet dog is getting up there in age. I want her to be around for as long as possible so I decided to supplement her food with these probiotics. She loves the flavor and eats them regularly each morning.( I fibbed and told her they were treats). She actually seems perkier and doesn’t have as much difficulty getting up and down. Is it the probiotics? I think so. It’s the only change I’ve made to her diet. These supplements are reasonably priced, the dog loves them. I’ll continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Christenson

customer_reviews.title: Solution to a Years Old Problem
customer_reviews.text: We have a senior cocker spaniel that was suffering from a greasy, smelly, itchy, bacterial skin problem. For years we have been feeding her a high quality diet (brown rice, carrots, green beans and a protein) and medicating with prednisone and Rx ointments from our vet. Nothing was solving the problem, only somewhat treating the symptoms. We used this product for 2 weeks and we are happy to say she is cured! We just toss it in her food once a day and she gobbles it up. This product will always be in our pantry.
customer_reviews.author: CancunVic

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater refuses to eat these
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a fairly picky eater (call him a meat and potatoes kind of dog). These probiotic chews have a green tint and a slight vegetable smell. I was expecting something a bit meatier like other probiotic chews I have used in the past. He immediately spit out the probiotic and has never attempted to eat another despite multiple varied efforts. If you’re dog is a picky eater, these might not be the best option.
customer_reviews.author: UtahGlamTomBoy

customer_reviews.title: yeast in product
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9 year old German shepherd I been given her this product for months. It has 50mg of yeast. Any form of yeast is not good for dogs. Sorry my vet advised me to stop using it. Her tummy was bloated and hard. Had trouble pooping. I stopped the pro biotic and 2 to 3 days latter she was back to normal. I gave her pumpkin in her food 1 table spoon. Everything is OK now. She is back to normal. No other product I have researched has yeast in it.
customer_reviews.author: Spike52

customer_reviews.title: Like product dogs like it too.
customer_reviews.text: I already reviewed this product for you. It helps my dogs was their digestion issues and that is the reason for the re order. Any pet owner who has a pet that has gas or does not completely absorb their food needs to have their owners check with their Veterinarian to be sure that there is nothing intrinsically a problem with the pet's diet or digestion per sea before any use of supplements. In our case all our "fids" furry kids are healthy and the probiotics work extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelie L.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I don't even want to give 1 star... Made my dog so sick, diarrhea and vomiting for days, ended up with 180.00 vet bill. Return window closed 4 days ago. Of course. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, thank you, thank you
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for dogs! Buddy, my dog nor I did not care for the taste much not that it was bad. Put them in his morning and evening treat and what a treat it is to have buddy looking half his age. Hair is better, corners of the eyes have cleared up, and his breath is good to unless he's been showing off, if you know what I mean. On are second month now and I see nothing but good things to say about how happy I am for The happiness my dog enjoys every day! Thank you so much and I'll check back in a month. Ñext time maybe I learn how to make film.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Our 12 Year Old Weimaraner LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: Our Weimaraner is 12 years old. He loves these probiotics! He is very picky so we were surprised! Do your research! Many dog probiotics are made from animal carcasses (really) - and also don't have the high ratio of Colony-Forming Unit (CFU) . The Vet actually recommended FortiiFlora, however after reearching we definately did NOT want to give them that (Look on-line). Our Weimaraner is 12 and had bouts of not eating, upset stomach & diarrhea. This probiotic really helps and he is doing so much better. Hope you also have a good experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your dog has a sensitive stomach TRY THESE.
customer_reviews.text: If only I had known about this product sooner!!!! Oh my goodness! My italian greyhounds have the most sensitive stomachs in the entire world. It has been a pain and an absolute mess at times. Grotesque. I won't go into further detail. You get the picture. These have been a GOD SEND. While they are a little bit pricey they are absolutely worth it! They keep them healthy and helped one of my dogs gain the weight he so desperately needed. They are pretty picky eaters so it took them a while to get used to them but now they love them like treats. I'll be ordering forever!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: After my dog had to go through a bout of antibiotics, his stool was really soft and you could tell that he wasn't feeling to well. I thought of introducing Probiotics back into his system and found this product. After only a few days his stool was back to normal and so was my dog. He is doing great now and I feed him these treats more infrequently for maintenance. Can only recommend this product :) By the way, this is one of the rare occasions, where you not only have Probiotics, but also the needed Prebiotics all in one product. Bonus: my dog loves the taste!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! They work!
customer_reviews.text: I have two senior pets that are on various meds. Both have had digestive, gas & appetite issues. After trying human forms of probiotics which seemed not to do anything or make matters worse, I decided to try these as a last cynical ditch effort. HOLY COW! Immediate improvement in all issues! I have tried chewable forms of supplements before and never had much success as they would turn their noses. They love these as much as treats! Absolutely a must for anyone with a k9 that is experiencing tummy problems. PS: My lab is also shedding less which a miracle in itself.
customer_reviews.author: pamela jane

customer_reviews.title: There are lots of probiotics out there and I have tried a lot of them but Probiotic Premium seems to work better. I am assuming this is due to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving it to my four dogs, but especially two of them need it for frequent bouts of diarrhea or soft stools. I just finished the first jar and have more on order as I plan to continue giving these probiotics. One of the dogs also has IBS. There are lots of probiotics out there and I have tried a lot of them but Probiotic Premium seems to work better. I am assuming this is due to the extra ingredients. I usually just put the chewy in their food or sometimes give it as a treat. Not a problem getting them to eat it. And Made in the USA.....that's important! I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product cured our dog's constant diarrhea! No more middle of the night bathroom breaks!
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISE REACTION!
customer_reviews.text: IT MAY NOT BE FAIR TO GIVE 2 STARS BASED ON MY DOGS REACTION TO THIS PRODUCT. I BOUGHT IT BECAUSE BAILEY WAS PASSING A LOT OF GAS. SHE WAS ON A DIFFERENT PROBIOTIC FROM AMAZON, NO PROBLEMS, EXCEPT FOR GAS. GAVE HER 1/2 A PORTION YESTERDAY, TODAY SHE HAD REALLY RUNNY. SHE WAS ULTRA SENSITIVE TO IT, WILL BE RETURNING TO THE PREVIOUS PROBIOTIC. RECOMMEND TO BE CAREFUL OF HOW MUCH YOU GIVE TO YOUR PET. IT MAY BE TOO MUCH OF A GOOD THING.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Siem

customer_reviews.title: These chewables are wonderful, noticed big improvement in my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: These chewables for your dogs are awesome. My lab and Sheppard X love them. Great for digestion, activity, and all around general health. These chewables have papaya, and 12 or 13 natural ingredients. No grain etc.. recognized by the FDA and made proudly in the USA. Can't say enough about these chewables. Dogs absolutely love them. Give each dog 1 after morning and then 1 after dinner feeding. You can give more once they get use to them. They have dosage on label and they don't smell awful. Have been using tablets about a month If you care for your pups as I do, give these a try. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Ronald S.

customer_reviews.title: I can be in the same room with my dog
customer_reviews.text: So my dog can clear a room with his gas. It is AWFUL. This stops the smell. Completely! You can still hear him farting, but they don't smell! believe me - it makes an incredible difference. If i stop giving them to him for a few days the smell comes back but once i start - it goes away. Like magic. Try these - my dog has been on them for years. best Lisa
customer_reviews.author: LisaML

customer_reviews.title: I feed him the best food available for senior dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog (18 yrs young) who suffered from bouts of diarrhea and vomiting. I feed him the best food available for senior dogs. I recalled how beneficial probiotics are for people and thought I would give this a try. Since adding this to his daily regimen, the diarrhea has stopped as well as the vomiting. He is healthy, energetic, has regular stools and his coat looks great. I believe this product is helping him absorb all the vital nutrients in his food and joint supplements. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great Company with Great Prices
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time using PetVitalityPro. Their shipping is fast, communication is stellar and the product arrives and works as advertised. I will be using the product again next month and look to PetVitalityPro for other pet Needs.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy E.

customer_reviews.title: lifesavers
customer_reviews.text: As posted in my first review.. we love these.. but I have just noticed , as we start on our second order..Gabby's shedding has almost stopped ! I have a German Sheperd....AKA..as a German SHEDDER.. We are amazed and delighted about this. Gabby is doing wonderfully on these probiotics. He loves them. HIGHLY recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S.

customer_reviews.title: Has helped calm our poodle bichon's GI system.
customer_reviews.text: Our poodle bichon mix Dallas had recurring problems with loose stools and hyperactive intestines regardless of his food (usually chicken and rice with kibble for snacking). He was a rescue and had been on the streets so no telling what he might have ingested. The PetVitalityPRO Probiotics have helped to calm his GI system down. And he looks forward to his daily "chewy" as a special treat. He wouldn't even eat another probiotic product we had tried. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lianne Magness

customer_reviews.title: Makes poops firm and solid.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! We have had Our rescue Black & Tan Coonhound for 6 weeks. Her poop was very loose when we got her. Adding 1/2 cup of pumpkin to every meal made her poop the consistency of canned pumpkin, which was an improvement, but still messy. I hate leaving smudges on the sidewalk! I tried another probiotic treat but they did not work at all. These probiotics transformed her poop instantly. They are darker, firm (almost hard!), and dry enough to pick up without leaving a mark. I am so, so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Lawyerchef

customer_reviews.title: The dogs like it!
customer_reviews.text: Dog taste buds are as unique as humans, that being said my super picky eater won’t eat these but the rest of my dogs eat it like a treat. I have other supplements more then half my dogs won’t eat so these probiotics have a great track record in my house. As for how they work, I really don’t know because I give them as regular health care not for a specific need. I think some probi’s are better then no probi’s and I hope these have the bonus of being good quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are too picky.
customer_reviews.text: My three dogs are refusing to eat these, picky I guess. I have use coconut oil, beacon grease, mixed with there can food, all they do is lick whatever I put on they licked off. I broke them up and but them inside the canned food, yet they managed to lick the canned food off the small pieces, then spit them out and ate the food. I had another brand and those they ate, not with great enthusiasm but they did eat them, these they will not eat at all. I was refunded for that I am grateful, but I wish I could have gotten the dog to eat them, two need these due to health issues.
customer_reviews.author: CherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: He had terrible allergies and I have to be very careful what ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about trying this for my dobe. He had terrible allergies and I have to be very careful what I give him. I started using this and within 5 days I started to see improvement with his skin and coat. He even acts like he feels better. I am excited to see how he will be when he is on it long term.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great product for our dogs. We have had issues with our pup eating his and our other dogs poop and we tried several things both from home and the vet and nothing was helping. Since starting this product he has not eaten poop except for the time we forgot to tell the dog sitter about this product, but since being back on it for a couple days we haven’t had any problems. Both dogs love the product and think it’s a treat. We will purchase this product over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought PetVitalityPRO Probiotics for Dogs with Natural Digestive Enzymes for my 16 year old Jack Russell - she has always had a sensitive stomach and bad breath to go along with it. She has been slowing down quite a bit lately and not eating very well. I gave her the recommended amount and within two days she was feeling better! I was amazed at the improvement and the only thing I did different was give her the enzymes! It's been 10 days since we started this product and she is eating much better, her breath has improved, and she has way more energy! I'm very impressed and happy that this product is working so well for my "pup"!
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My 15 lb Shih-Tzu/Maltese mix didn't have any specific problems that led me to these probiotics. Instead, they were purchased as a precautionary measure after he was prescribed a regimen of antibiotics for some digestive tract issues. This can be tough on both good and bad gut bacteria, so I figured that some probiotics couldn't hurt once his treatment was done. I can't say for sure if he needed them, but he sure likes them, hasn't had any ill effects, and I think that they may have improved his breath.
customer_reviews.author: R. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Made our dog sick...
customer_reviews.text: We were so hopeful that this would help our boy's itchy skin and sensitive tummy. We even started out with ONE chew even though his recommended dose for his weight was 3! We were going to slowly bring him up to 3 but he started PUKING a LOT every night we gave them to him. The only thing that changed was these probiotics. We were scared to continue them and wish we could get a refund :/
customer_reviews.author: Katie Eckelberry

customer_reviews.title: Helps with ear/yeast infections.
customer_reviews.text: Totally helped with skin and ear problems for my terrier/dachshund/shihtzu mix. I recommend this to my friends and to anybody else with four legged friends with allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Spence

customer_reviews.title: Loose stools no more
customer_reviews.text: My husband rescued our sweet boy 4 years ago and he has ALWAYS had loose stools till I purchased this product. He now doesn’t ever have an upset stomach and his stools are great. I am a subscriber and I recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Laird

customer_reviews.title: Want your dog healthy try these
customer_reviews.text: Really helped my German Shepherd puppy. His poo was starting to become really watery and I was starting to get really worried. I decided that I should probably try a good quality probiotic and I came across Pet Vitality Pro and decided to give it a try, to my surprise this probiotic showed results almost immediately. His poo started looking healthy and his attitude had completely changed for the better. I will be recommending this to friends its actually works with awesome results!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Good all around vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I started giving this to our pit bull to strengthen her immune system which generally starts in the stomach. Initially we are trying a home remedy for folliculitus paired with microbial shampoo. Not sure if it’s this or the shampoo that’s improving her skin and hair regrowth but I can say it isn’t making it worse. It has definitely helped make the poops firmer and she has no problem eating this with food or as a treat. Our pup gobbles them down. So far I’m loving this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Riot

customer_reviews.title: Cancer nausea/vomiting
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my beautiful Golden Retriever who has been diagnosed with metastatic cancer two months ago. He has recently began vomiting, but with the probiotics the vomiting is less severe. Hopefully Probotics will be beneficial with less nausea.
customer_reviews.author: MB of Troy

customer_reviews.title: Yes, It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first (because of the price) but I sucked it up and bought a bottle. I have two Frenchies, and one of them chronically has messy, soft poop. I am weary of cleaning this dog’s bum. I began giving the dogs two chews each with their evening feeding, based on the recommendation for their weight. Lilly Belle’s poop firmed up in just TWO DAYS!! So now both the dogs and Mom are happy, happy. I just reordered and bought the bottle of 150 count. More economical. So it’s definitely an investment, but so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dietary Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I added this supplement to my adult dog's diet, because I thought it would aid her digestion. Not only does it aid in her digestion; it makes her less gassy! My Boston Terrier seems to have a sensitive stomach, but I can tell that this supplement (made in the shape of a Heart) really soothes my Strawberry's tummy. The maker of this supplement also provides SUPERB customer support and insight. You just can't go wrong with this product. I'm lucky to have found this.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Branch

customer_reviews.title: Hassle to return
customer_reviews.text: Dog didn’t like and accidentally ordered two. Will just throw away; as it’s a hassle to return during the Coronavirus restrictions. Won’t purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Burton

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for rat terrier
customer_reviews.text: Update - the seller was super nice and refunded my money ! I purchased this because the seller and some reviewers said dogs liked this as a treat. My rat terrier would not eat it alone or hidden in food! She did get a little bite that was hidden in a pill pocket and it made her throw up ! I was truly hoping this would help with her scratching but we never got to the point of her taking it .
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pittman

product_meta.title: PetVitalityPRO Probiotics for Dogs with Natural Digestive Enzymes ● 4 Bill CFUs/2 Soft Chews ● Dog Diarrhea Upset Stomach Yeast Gas Bad Breath Immunity Allergies Skin Itching Hot Spots
product_meta.description:
Size:60

Probiotic Premium Plus by PetVitalityPRO – The premium formula with 20 VALUABLE INGREDIENTS in ONE PRODUCT!

Carefully formulated to combine the right ingredients in the right proportions to work for your dog:

- Increase gastrointestinal health 
- Boost immune system 
- Enrich your dog's diet with antioxidants, bioavailable vitamins, minerals and phytonutrients + increase absorption 
- Boost energy and stamina 
- Support and restore digestive tract during and after antibiotic and steroid treatments 
- Support digestive and overall health during training, travel and times of increased stress 
- Support your puppy to develop a stronger immune system and healthier body systems thus reducing the risk of developing future health issues like allergies and digestive tract issues 
- Help your aging dog support vital body systems and boost it's health and vitality

RECOMMENDED FOR dogs of all ages and breeds. Especially beneficial for dogs with any kind of + gastrointestinal disorder (i.e. diarrhea, constipation, gas, malabsorption) + immunity deficiency + dogs on antibiotics or steroids treatments + allergy issues + skin and coat conditions + bad breath + vitamins and minerals deficiency + energy and stamina deficiency + working dogs + aging dogs + puppies + dogs during training, travel or times of increased stress.

MADE IN USA Manufactured in USA in an inspected facility. All certified ingredients. We make sure, that our product is 100% SAFE for your dog. Every production batch is MICROBIOLOGICALY TESTED in a third party lab, to proof safety and purity. Produced in small batches - always benefit from a fresh product with long shelf life.

Purchasing from PetVitalityPRO, you will enjoy 60 days 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. So give it a try! Get the best for your dog companion and start reducing your vet and medicine cost today!
feature_bullets: COMPLETE DIGESTIVE HEALTH & IMMUNE SYSTEM BOOSTER. The #1 high potency probiotics / prebiotics formula for dogs with premium ingredients! Veterinarian formulated to work. Made in USA and certified safe.

SUPPORT YOUR DOG'S DIGESTIVE HEALTH: diarrhea, loose stool, upset stomach, yeast infection, constipation, gas, bad breath, bloating, malabsorption, vomiting. Supports and restores gut health during and after antibiotic and steroids treatment.

BOOST IMMUNE SYSTEM, OVERALL HEALTH AND VITALITY: Helps protect against infection and disease. Promotes absorption of vital nutrients by providing natural digestive enzymes, bioavailable vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, and phytonutrients. Support for allergy, skin and coat conditions, hot spots, urinary tract infections.

A SUPER HEALTHY, TASTY AND REWARDING TREAT to boost the health and vitality of your dog companion! Dog probiotics - so soft and easily chewable! SO GIVE IT A TRY - RISK FREE! At PetVitalityPRO we are proud to offer you our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with our product, simply let us know and we'll provide a full refund, no questions asked. For your pet’s health and safety, PLEASE READ the IMPORTANT INFORMATION SECTION BELOW, including the SAFETY INFORMATION.
TRUSTED QUALITY – Probiotic Premium Plus is MADE IN THE USA, in an inspected facility, GMP and SQF certified. Because our pets, deserve the best!
